sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_852107_enterpr_0.asa_override</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>asa_override</name><script><![CDATA[var asa_override = Class.create();
asa_override.prototype = {
   status : function() {
	var abc = new GlideRecord('x_852107_enterpr_0_governance_item');
	abc.addQuery('sys_id', current.sys_id);
	abc.query();
	while(abc.next()){
		current.u_choice_4 = 'sad uploaded (approval in progress)';
		current.update();
	}
	var pqr = new GlideRecord('x_852107_enterpr_0_engagement');
	pqr.addQuery('u_reference_1', current.sys_id);
	pqr.query();
	while(pqr.next()){
		pqr.u_choice_9 = 'requesting approval';
		pqr.update();
	}

	
},	

    type: 'asa_override'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-24 12:23:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>88c570d22fe46110b66ad3f62799b63f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>asa_override</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture" source="x_852107_enterpr_0">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_88c570d22fe46110b66ad3f62799b63f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-24 13:23:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
